chinese_title: 選舉佈告及十二月廿四日佈告
english_title: Election Notice in 大漢公報 (Chinese Times Newspaper) and A Copywriting of Election Notice on December 24, 1926
subject: 加拿大黃江夏堂實業有限公司/ Wong Kung Har Tong Company Limited; 大漢公報/ Chinese Times Newspaper;
description: A notice advertised in 大漢公報/ Chinese Times Newspaper announced that the fourth staff election would be held from December 24 to 31, 1927. The primary election would be held on January 23, 1927. Members of the Wong clan who held shares in the Wong Kung Har Tong Company Limited were encouraged to participate in the election.
title: 選舉佈告及十二月廿四日佈告

chinese_title: 第四次職員選舉章程、方式及重要日期
english_title: Official Letter: Dates and Procedures for the Fourth Staff Election
subject: 加拿大黃江夏堂實業有限公司/ Wong Kung Har Tong Company Limited; 黃洽昌; 黃儉傳
description: An official letter from President 黃洽昌 and Secretary 黃儉傳 announced that the Wong Kung Har Tong Company Limited conducted its fourth staff election according to established rules. The company issued ballots for the primary election and encouraged Wong clan members to vote on January 23, 1927. Ballots were to be returned to the company by January 31, 1927, with vote counting scheduled for February 1, 1927. The secondary election for the primary elected candidates would be scheduled for February 6, 1927.
title: 第四次職員選舉章程、方式及重要日期
